body_html:
The best thing to do if you want to build without access to the internet would be to download the files mentioned in the WORKSPACE and tensorflow.bzl (all things grabbed by new_http_archive etc.), unpack them, and replace new_http_archive (and similar) with new_local_repository rules.

You shouldn't have to build these dependencies, bazel will do that for you. See the bazel docs for more info.

Your particular error looks like it got confused by several distinct versions of protobuf visible to the compiler.

Your particular error looks like it got confused by several distinct versions of protobuf visible to the compiler.
body:
The best thing to do if you want to build without access to the internet would be to download the files mentioned in the WORKSPACE and tensorflow.bzl (all things grabbed by `new_http_archive` etc.), unpack them, and replace `new_http_archive` (and similar) with `new_local_repository` rules.

You shouldn't have to build these dependencies, bazel will do that for you. See the [bazel docs](https://www.bazel.io/versions/master/docs/be/workspace.html#new_local_repository) for more info.

Your particular error looks like it got confused by several distinct versions of protobuf visible to the compiler.
